boardgame.name: Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies
Axis and Allies
boardgame.description: Axis and Allies is the most successful of Milton Bradley's Gamemaster series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;It depicts WWII on a grand scale, full global level. Up to five players can play on two different teams. The Axis which has Germany and Japan, and the Allies which has the USA, the United Kingdom, and the USSR. A full map of the world is provided, broken up in various chunks similar to Risk. The game comes with gobs of plastic miniatures that represent various military units during WWII. Players have at their disposal infantry, armor, fighters, bombers, battleships, aircraft carriers, submarines, troop transports, anti-air guns, and factories. All of the units perform differently and many have special functions. Players have to work together with their teammates in order to coordinate offenses and decide how best to utilize their production points. Players also have the option of risking production resources on the possibility of developing a super technology that might turn the tide of war._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Axis and Allies was originally published by Nova Games in 1981._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Anniversary Edition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Allies: Global 1940 (Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Pacific 1940 combined with Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Europe 1940)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expanded by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Totally Untested Volume 2 of Max's Advanced Rules for Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies (Unofficial expansion)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Conquest of the Pacific (Unofficial expansion)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Midway (Unofficial expansion)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

But a completely servicable box. Shipping will require an additional charge, (probably $4.21) for a box, and it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s fairly heavy.

English MB edition. Played only a few times. Undamaged condition. Two complete games in one box : extra gameboard, playing pieces, dice, money, plastic chips and all other game components. Also included in the box is _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The World at War_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; expansion 3rd edition by Xeno Games. http://www.boardgamegeek.com/viewitem.php3?gameid=3618

MB Edition second edition. The contents are sorted in trays and and in very good condition. A small depression on one corner of the box, otherwise in very good shape.
Pre-revised edition. Beat but complete. Ask me for details.
Game is in superb shape. All the components have been ziplocked by faction. Styrofoam divider trays still attached. Box and lid are almost in new condition, no splits, tears, or wear.
1986 2nd edition MB Gamemaster Series. Opened but never played. All plastic pieces are baggied. Nice, big box! If paying with PayPal, I cannot accept credit card or debit card orders.
MB Gamemasters Series
Original NOVA edition. Very good condition.

Complete copy. If you want to see the edition, see Image 60508. Some minor damage: Box is a little worn and dinged. The trays have been separated and labeled. Part of the manual has a small stain on it. Some of the minis are damaged, but totally usable.
Game is complete. No tears to box and no splits on box or lid. All the pieces are present and accounted for.
good condition, complete MB big box version. partially unpunched. box is a little worn, and has some dings. board is excellent with no tears.
Box and lid are in acceptable condition, board is in very good condition, components are in good condition. Complete.

New in shrink. This is the MB Gamemaster version.
Axis and Allies. 100% complete + extras. This copy is in very good - like new condition. Cover art bright w/only the very slightest of wear. I welcome international buyers!!!
Box has some water damage and a torn corner. Some of the original dice are missing, but otherwise it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s complete. Free to a good home. You only pay for shipping.

Complete with second edition rules and Q_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;A sheet. I counted all of the bits and everything is there, including extra infantry for each country, but a single British fighter is missing (there are 9 instead of 10). I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know if that has any impact on game play or not. The components and board are all in very good condition. The box is dished in a bit and has moderate shelf wear.

Box lid has concave in middle and the edges suffer from shelf wear. Game itself is in great shape and no pieces are missing. This is the original edition. I am willing to send any photo requests. Just drop me a line.

Box is very shelfworn with some caving in occurring in the lid. Its the old, monster box version. All components are present and in good shape. I expect shipping costs to be higher on this item due to size and weight.
New. In Shrink Wrap. 1987 Milton Bradley version.
New in shrink. Shipping is 11.95. I will combine shipping with other games. Will ship worldwide just ask for a quote.

Box cover has noticable dishing and wear at the corners. Please see high res. image in my personal gallery. More photos available upon request. Game contents are in very good+ shape. The money has been used and the stack does not lie perfectly flat like new money would. The game has been inventoried and all components are present. All plastic game pieces are intact. Will combine shipping on multiple items and international buyers welcome.
1981/1982 version, Still shrink wrapped, unopened

Game is used but complete and in very good condition. Box is a little scuffed on the corners, other than that it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a pretty good copy. All the pieces and the board are undamaged. Buyer pays exact shipping costs. Thanks for looking.
Unpunched! Some dishing of the box lid. 1991 version with the rules FAQ.

AXIS _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; ALLIES DICE! Add an Edge to your Game with these Field Marshal Games EXCLUSIVE COMBAT DICE. Highest quality and Custom crafted with the Military insignia of each major combatant Nation of the Second World War. The Perfect Edition to your Favorite Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Strategy War Game. Each National Set includes 6 Dice each! Complete set includes 6 UK Dice, 6 Germany Dice, 6 USA Dice, 6 USSR Dice and 6 Japan Dice... A total of 30 DICE!!!

Box has shelf wear and split corners, which I have repaired with cardboard hinges on the inside. Box top dished. Board and bits all in Very Good shape. Missing the following: 2 red dice. JAPAN: 2 transports, 1 sub, 1 aircraft carrier) Note: I built four replacement ships out of matte board to make the game completely playable. **** EXTRAS: Troops (1 USSR, 3 US, 2 UK, 2 JAPAN) 1 UK aircraft carrier. 1987 MB edition of Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Box has wear _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; tear - some bowing, small paper tears at the edges, but no split corners. Contains Game Play Manual, board, battle board, shrinkwrapped deck of production certificates, the five reference charts, weapons development chart, Rules Clarification sheet, and six plastic-wrapped styrofoam game trays containing all the little pieces. I have not counted all the pieces, but it *looks* complete - there are plenty of pieces for each country, all the dice are there, every country has control markers, and miniatures, etc. If you need more details, I will provide them.
Reserved for Freitag.

Axis and Allies (1987) by Milton Bradley Box: Light shelfwear with several dings, dents, and creases. In addition, the box top has one split corner that extends approximately 2_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; in each direction along the box edges. That same corner also has a deep crease that extends approximately 2/3 of the way down the box side. Overall the box is in very good condition. Components: Complete and in like new condition! Pieces have been sorted and stored in plastic bags for convenience and protection - you will be very pleased with how the game has been packaged. SHIPPING: U.S. shipping will be via USPS Priority Shipping and based on a weight of 6 Lbs. from zip code 85208. International buyers are very welcome, but please contact me for a shipping price quote to avoid any surprises or misunderstandings.
I keep my games in very good condition. I separate the pieces with zip lock bags and store my games in a cool dry place. Any questions let me know. Thanks,
7 copies, per auction, Chris Strabala winner

All games are new and in their original wrapping. We offer only goods that we have in stock. We ship worldwide – please ask for a quote about exact shipping costs (rest assured that we always try to keep them as low as possible). Payment may be made by Paypal or bank transfer in advance. For orders above €50 we grant a discount of €4 on shipping costs. If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email (laden@gamers-hq.de), give us a call (+49 30 79706126) or visit our homepage (Gamers HQ) Innerhalb Deutschlands gilt: Die Versandkosten betragen 4,00 € . Ab einem Bestellwert von 50,00 € fallen keine Versandkosten an! Bezahlt werden kann per paypal, Vorauskasse, Bankeinzug oder direkt bei uns im Laden (wenn ihr aus Berlin kommt). Wenn ihr noch irgendwelche Fragen habt, ruft uns an (030 79706126), schickt uns ne Mail (laden@gamers-hq.de) oder besucht unsere Homepage (Gamers HQ). Und hier noch die übliche, rechtliche Belehrung: Sie können ohne Angabe von Gründen durch Erklärung per Fax, E-Mail oder einfaches Briefschreiben oder durch Rücksendung unserer Waren eine Bestellung widerrufen. Für die Absendung der Widerrufserklärung oder unserer Waren ist eine Widerrufsfrist von zwei Wochen einzuhalten, die mit Eingang unserer Lieferung bei Ihnen beginnt.
Unsere Ware ist sofort nach der fristgerechten Ausübung des Widerrufsrechts auf unsere Kosten und Gefahr an uns zurückzusenden, wenn der Widerruf nicht bereits durch Rücksendung ausgeübt wurde. Achten Sie bitte bei der Rücksendung darauf, dass Sie eine geeignete Verpackung benutzen, vorzugsweise die Originalverpackung. Ausnahmsweise sind die Kosten der Rücksendung von Ihnen zu tragen, wenn der Rechnungswert unserer Ware nicht mehr als Euro 20,00 beträgt. In keinem Fall haben Sie die Kosten der Rücksendung zu tragen, wenn die von uns gelieferte Ware nicht der bestellten Ware entspricht. Sollten Sie bereits den Kaufpreis für die Ware bezahlt haben, werden wir diesen nach einem Widerruf unverzüglich zurückerstatten. Wenn Sie unsere Ware nach dem Widerruf ganz oder teilweise nicht oder nur in verschlechtertem Zustand zurücksenden, sind Sie uns gesetzlich zu Wertersatz verpflichtet. Das gilt nicht, soweit Sie unsere Ware lediglich so geprüft haben, wie Sie es z.B. im Ladengeschäft hätten tun können. Jede darüber hinausgehende Nutzung der Ware berechtigt uns jedoch zu Ersatzansprüchen, die unter Umständen die Höhe des Kaufpreises erreichen können. Sollten Sie also einen Widerruf in Betracht ziehen, beschränken Sie sich möglichst auf eine optische Prüfung und nehmen Sie die Ware nicht regulär in Gebrauch.

Complete and in near-mint condition except box which has a few rips and tears and serious shelf wear, but is still sturdy enough to hold the game. As a bonus, you get an unofficial expansion called _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;A_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;A Accessory_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; which adds super bombers, jeeps, jet fighters, heavy fighters, landing craft, and V2 rockets in plastic molded pieces for each country. Includes rules for the base game, rules clarifications, and rules for the unofficial expansion.

Still in shrink, but the top is a bit concave from being pressed upon. Bottom has a couple of creases, also from being pressed upon. Can do face-to-face handoff in the Washington DC area. for _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Indhra_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; who bought this in my auction.

1987 Gamemaster Second Edition. The box has one corner taped back together, as well as some dishing, but otherwise looks good. All components are complete and in good condition.

I have the 1981, Nova Game Designs Citadel Series version of Axis and Allies. Box has some shelf and some edgewear. All game materials are present (I did not individually count all the chits for each set of playing pieces, and am not sure how many there should be anyway, but there are a substantial number of each nation). Production certificates are crisp and lightly if ever circulated. Shipping will be $8 to Eastern and Central parts of the US and $10 to Mountain and Pacific. Other regions please inquire.

Milton Bradley second edition. Good playable condition. Box has wear, including one taped corner on the bottom and one split corner on the top. Contains 17 infantry per country instead of the listed 15. Missing 3 control markers: one British, one German, and one US (the game is supposed to have 20 per country and these countries only have 19). These missing markers shouldn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t affect gameplay. Contains 6 red and 56 white plastic discs (rules don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t specify how many it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s supposed to have). The rules also don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t list the money count - this copy has 32xOnes, 33xFives, 32xTens. Shipping is $18. Combined shipping rates are available when purchasing multiple games.
Reserved for Jerri Mullis. Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies Pizza Box Football Killer Bunnies Diplomacy Set of 6 card games

CONTENTS 1 Extra Large Game Board Five armies each consisting of; 10 Tanks(One American Tank is missing), 3 Bombers, 10 Fighter Planes, 15 Infantry, 2 Aircraft Carriers, 6 Submarines, 6 Transport Ships, 3 Battle Ships and 20 Control markers. 12 Industrial Complexes, 11 Anti- Aircraft Guns (Should be 12 But one is missing) 12 Six – Sided Dice, 26 Extra Unit Markers 26 One Value-Production Certificates, 33 Five Value-Production Certificates and 29 Ten Value-Production Certificates 7 Control Charts RULE BOOK IS MISSING, all components are in good condition, box is VERY worn with sunken lid and tears that have been repaired with tape. Due to the size of the game I can only post to the UK Postage will be about £10, if it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s any more I will make up the difference, as I would rather the game go to a good home than get binned due to lack of space.

I have two copies of MB_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Axis _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Allies for sale. Both copies have the second edition rules included (along with a single sheet printout of the third edition rules changes). These games were acquired way back in the late 1980_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s/early 1990_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s. So, these are not new games. However, they are still in pretty good shape after twenty-plus years. I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t think these two copies of the game were ever played. If they were, it was only once. Both game boxes are acceptable due to being around for 20+ years. They have various scratches and marks on them. The box lid is certainly flaring along the long edges. Ink has rubbed off at the box corners (as one would expect). Both game boxes also have indentations from other games being on top of them. One of the game boxes has a circle indentation. Not sure where that came from. Inside, the components are in very good condition. All components are present (via a rough count). All five country Reference Charts are present along with the National Production Chart and the battleboard. Each game still has the original six game trays (one for each country and one for common components). Each individual game tray has been wrapped in plastic wrap to keep the components together and in the same tray. This applies to both games. Components have appeared to bounce around in each game tray, but have stayed to each game tray. In one copy of the game, the money bounced around the game box. Some of the money was bent and folded just a bit. Both sets of money are now in a plastic bag. Both games come from a non-smoking house.
